Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Client
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientCLI, ClientGUI
public abstract class Client
extends java.lang.Object
this abstract client class has been organized to made transparent all messages between client and server, independently which type of implementation is used in the client (CLI, GUI)

      public abstract java.lang.Thread asyncReadFromSocket​(java.io.ObjectInputStream socketIn)
